channel.title: 525 BH only [ Bug in diff map ]
channel.description:
As i run a BH 525 only source right now. I attempted to go to the ''real'' runescape world map. As i come there and spawn a NPC and right click it the ''interface'' of the ''NPC'' dissapears within a second.
Any idea to fix this?

item.title: 525 BH only [ Bug in diff map ]
item.dc:creator: @stickywicky stickywicky
item.description:
@stickywicky wrote:

you realise when you spawn an npc it doesnt stay thier…
you need to add the npc to your spawn class
…if your new id go to 317 servers

Read full topic
item.source: 525 BH only [ Bug in diff map ]
